sources.title: King of the Newsboys
sources.description: Lew Ayres is a poor young man whose girl is stolen by a rich man.

sources.title: King of the Newsboys (1938) DRAMA
sources.description:
Stars: Lew Ayres, Helen Mack, Alison Skipworth 
Director: Bernard Vorhaus

A poor young man's girlfriend leaves him for a rich and powerful gangster. Determined to show her the mistake she's made, he starts a successful newspaper distribution business, but things don't turn out exactly the way he planned.

sources.title: King of the Newsboys (1938) Drama Full Length Movie
sources.description:
A poor young man's girlfriend leaves him for a gangster, who has the money and power she wants and the young man doesn't have. Determined to show her that he can be a success--and how much of a mistake she made by leaving him--he starts up a newspaper distribution business that is soon the biggest in the city.

Director: Bernard Vorhaus
Writers: Louis Weitzenkorn, Peggy Thompson 
Stars: Lew Ayres, Helen Mack, Alison Skipworth 
Genres: Classics, Drama

metadata.Plot: A poor young man's girlfriend leaves him for a gangster, who has the money and power she wants and the young man doesn't have. Determined to show her that he can be a success--and how much of a mistake she made by leaving him--he starts up a newspaper distribution business that is soon the biggest in the city, but things don't turn out exactly the way he wanted them to.
metadata.Writer: Louis Weitzenkorn, Peggy Thompson, Samuel Ornitz
